add_new_version_error: An error occurred while creating the version
add_new_version_no_value_message: The most recent version of this secret is not active and cannot be used as a template. Please retrieve the value of a previous active version to create your new version.
cas_with_description_tooltip: When CAS is enabled, make sure to always specify the version number when making changes.
create_okms_success: Your OKMS domain has been created.
create_okms_terms_and_conditions_confirm: I have read and agree to the terms and conditions, the appendix relating to the processing of personal data, and the special terms and conditions of OVH services.
create_okms_terms_and_conditions_descrip: To activate your region, you need to create an OKMS domain. Do you want to proceed with activating your region?
delete_secret_modal_description: Are you sure you want to delete the secret {{secretPath}}? This action cannot be reversed.
delete_version_modal_description: Are you sure you want to delete this version? This action cannot be reversed.
error_duplicate_keys: You cannot have two identical keys.
error_empty_keys: You cannot have an empty key.
error_invalid_duration: The expiry duration must be a duration (e.g: 30s, 5m, 2h, 7d, 7d1h30m10s)
error_key_value_conversion: The secret value cannot be converted to key-value pairs.
error_path_allowed_characters: The path can only contain the following characters: A-Z a-z 0-9 . _ : / = @ and -
error_path_structure: The path cannot start or end with '/', nor can it contain two '/' in a row.
error_update_settings: An error has occurred updating the settings
form_helper_cas_required_okms: CAS is enabled on the OKMS domain. Disabling on the secret will not be taken into account.
form_helper_max_versions: Enter "0" to use the default value ({{default}}).
guide_use_in_manager: Use Secret Manager in the OVHcloud Control Panel
guide_use_in_manager_description: Find out how to create, manage and use your secrets via the graphical interface.
guide_use_with_kv2_api: Use Secret Manager with the Hashicorp Vault KV2-compatible API
guide_use_with_kv2_api_description: Learn how to access your OKMS domain to create, manage and use secrets using the HashiCorp Vault KV2-compatible API, available to ensure compatibility with existing services.
guide_use_with_rest_api: Use Secret Manager with the REST API
guide_use_with_rest_api_description: Find out how to access your OKMS domain to create, manage and use secrets via the REST API, which is also used for managing Services Keys.
okms_activation_in_progress: Enabling OKMS domain for the {{region}} region... Please wait.
onboarding_description_2: Secret Manager, based on OKMS, is the fully managed centralised secret management service for your OVHcloud applications and services.
path_field_helper: To create a hierarchy, use '/' Example: prod/database/MySQL
secrets_pricing_subtitle: Each version of the secret will be billed.
no_version_message: There is no version associated with this secret.
create_secret_form_okms_not_selected: OKMS domain is not available in this region. To create a secret, you need to first create an OKMS domain.
form_helper_max_versions_default: Enter “0” to use the default value ({{value}}).
form_helper_max_versions_domain: Enter “0” to use the OKMS domain value ({{value}}).
